typeSystemDescription.name: JCoRe Document Meta Types
typeSystemDescription.description: The types of this type system reflect meta data about documents for rather specific use cases.

typeDescription.name: de.julielab.jcore.types.ext.DBProcessingMetaData
typeDescription.description: This type stores required information for the appropiate handling of consistent XMI deserialization in the XMI reader and serialization in the XMI consumer with respect to the separate storage of annotations.

featureDescription.name: primaryKey
featureDescription.description: The primary key of an artefact, possibly consisting of multiple components.

featureDescription.name: subsetTable
featureDescription.description: The subset table that is used to specify the set of documents to processes and to store processing status information. May be empty in the case the documents are directly read from a data table.
